verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Bind us together, Lord, Bind us together with cords that can not be broken.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Bind us together, Lord, Bind us together together,
Bind us together together love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 1.There is only one God,There is only one king;

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: There is only one body, that is why we sing:

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: 2.Made for the glory of God, purchased by his precious son;

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Born with the right to be clean, for Jesus the victory has won.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: 3.You are the family of God, you are the promise divine;

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: You are God's chosen desire, you are the glorious new wine.
